original_text: But now apart from the law the righteousness of God has been made known, to which the Law and the Prophets testify.
korean_text: 이제는 율법 외에 하나님의 한 의가 나타났으니 율법과 선지자들에게 증거를 받은 것이라

sentences.original_text: But now apart from the law
the righteousness of God has been made known
to which the Law and the Prophets testify
